title: I'm appalled that cancers like this are spreading throughout India without any resistance.
selftext:
Video 1: [Rome was named after ram](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/lIm7rpdecoU)

Video 2: [Egypt was named after ram's grandfather](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/F7N8IE4nsdg)

Video 3: [Rome was named after ram part 2 (ft. how it was established on ram navami)](https://shorturl.at/bhnU0)

I feel like this is the perfect example of "presentation matters more than content". You can say shit like this and people will eat it up.

Many people follow ISKCON and this liar, and a lot of them accept these without hesitation. I don't know what to feel, whether to be angry at this cheat or be sad for the people agreeing to this.
comments:
Ahahahaha it is shocking but that's the truth

These days, religion stuff sells like water... no one cares 

And above all, the mass agrees
Just for fun - https://twitter.com/adityavnayak/status/1643202754004017152.
Indians were always like this. Now government support is there, that's the only difference.
Is this the same guy who promoted child marriage?
100% ...u don't need any credibility to spread info and people take things at face value. Such a bad time to be on internet ü•≤
Yes, this is the same douchebag
Most people are braindead, just use their dumbness to your advantage, let them be, dont complain.
By this logic  Ram is a sheep because male sheep are called Ram
Easiest way to become rich: become an educated baba and spread bullshit. Just have to be bit knowledgeable about vedas and show a few gimmick chamatkars. Andh viswas is the downfall of our country.
Now they atleast can't call Sonia Gandhi, a foreigner. She's from land of Ram.
And when you try to tell the idiots who believe this that is is nonsense, they will say Western media is brainwashing us.

Vatican city is named after Ashok Vatika.  


(PS: Vatican and Vatika both mean garden though)
Romulus to this guy - "Am I a joke to you?"
üòÖ

but it¬¥s 100% confirmed... 

clever to mute the comments, so nobody can call him liar....

Samajh me nahi aata ki hasu ya roun ye sab dekhke

Andher nagri chaupat raja
[Ye sab kya dekhna pad raha hai. Acha hai mai andha hoon.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jYJFYrCvZ4s)

Iskcon is just better off and accurate without the Isk. 

Complete dumbshits.
What is this?????
Looks like someone hasn't heard of Remus and Romulus
Bewkufo ki koi kami nhi hamare Desh mein aur unhi bewkufo ko bewkuf banane walon ki bhi koi kami nhi hai.
Do they have English versions anywhere?
Fun fact - ‚ÄúRomulus was named after Ram‚Äù
Wait...the majority population in MizoRAM is christian...!!!

What a time to be alive in the country, you can pedal any shit in the name of religion. 

Ps - only upside, the memes are fun
Battering ram

I thought you were gonna discuss about the actual cancer.

This shit is prevalent and idc about it.
Wasn't this guy on beer biceps podcast.  Bro that podcast has turned into a mouthpiece for misinformation smh
Uno Reverse
Whataboutism 101
We have our own versions of Zakir Naik.

NO actually English just a cheap rip off of sanskrit, Duh

/s
Thanks to BeeJayyPeee.
Computers can not run without RAM.
Something like video 1 in OP‚Äôs description!

Tejo Mahalaya?

Made by Aliens.

For RAM...
That‚Äôs deep XD

Whataboutism is the only thing one have to say about it, ????

ever heard about chattambi swamikal, he has written a book on church misdeeds almost a hundred years back.

So one can endorse some and one can hate others do the thing for decades? Around 25000 churches are there in kerala, and number was growing till the current central govt wanted details of how these foreign funds be used.

Not even the current state govt wont allow; even forced a minister to apologise formally when he publicly visited Guruvayoor temple and prayed, at the same time allows hajj and churches missdeeds.

Hindus in kerala is forced to be part of CPM and live like underdogs and are being abused

I hate both!
Converted them, in TNAndra it is happening

Whataboutism is the only thing one have to say about it, ????

ever heard about chattambi swamikal, he has written a book on church misdeeds almost a hundred years back.

So one can endorse some and one can hate others do the thing for decades? Around 25000 churches are there in kerala, and number was growing till the current central govt wanted details of how these foreign funds be used.

Not even the current state govt wont allow; even forced a minister to apologise formally when he publicly visited Guruvayoor temple and prayed, at the same time allows hajj and churches missdeeds.

Hindus in kerala is forced to be part of CPM and live like underdogs and are being abused

I hate both!
I have a question. Who is he?

You know, there's this concept of average IQ of a country. Not sure how they measure it, but shall we put it this way that Indians did not amaze anyone. We were probably not even in the top 50.

I'm not saying all of us are dumb, I'm sure you there's a bell shaped curve to this distribution. The point is that even the top 0.1% of us = 14 lakh people which is a huge number. These are the people who go on to achieve something brilliant. The rest of us are there to cheer and forward it amongst ourselves on WhatsApp.

/end of rant
Gotta start one of those.
By that logic Great White Sharks are Hindus, cause they breathe through Ram Ventilation.
I am more of a siege ram guy
But at the same time some people still believe that one messenger flew from A to B on a donkey and only witness of the miracle was, the donkey. While another messenger walked on water.
Idk about Rome cause Greeks had connection to India through Alexander The Great. But Egypt was named wayyy before hindu civilization or mythology indus mythology is a near it.
Duh he was Ramulus
Wow! Is that just a coincidence or is there some reason behind it?
My guess is Proto-Indo-European languages family root. Same source for both the words.
Ok so I searched for the meaning of Vatican and got nothing about gardens lol
Waiting for RAM = Ram‚Äôs Ayodhya Memories

Haha, I stand corrected.  


I had checked this some time back. Now it seems all sources have changed :D
8gb Ram
